about_the_game:
Game Introduction

"Drunk Woman" is a desktop game that allows you to place characters on your computer desktop. The characters have excellent physical softness effects and can be swung around, interacted with, observed closely, etc., which can bring you some fun in your free time!

Puppet System

The whole body of the character has a physical soft effect and can be swung at will

Excellent Rendering Quality

The character's hair is digitally styled, and the skin and clothes can be zoomed in to see the details

Game Features

  • A beautiful desktop girlfriend
  • 2 clothes
  • 4 hairstyles
  • Puppet System
  • Physical softening effect

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not suitable for all ages, or may not be suitable for viewing at work: nudity or sexual content, general adult content, Adult game content only. All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

name: Drunk Woman - Expansion
supported_languages: English, French, German, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
